00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples

00045 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 void MasterTimer_Configuration(void);
00047 void SlaveTimer_Configuration(void);
00048 
00049 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00051   * @brief  Main program.
00052   * @retval None
00053   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00054 int main(void)
00055 {
00056   MasterTimer_Configuration();
00057   SlaveTimer_Configuration();
00058 
00059   #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_TM_MASTER_IPN))
00060   /* MCTM channel Main Output Enable                                                                        */
00061   MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00062   #endif
00063 
00064   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00065 
00066   while (1)
00067   {
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00072   * @brief  GPTM Configuration.
00073   * @retval None
00074   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00075 void MasterTimer_Configuration(void)
00076 {
00077   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00078      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00079      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00080   */
00081   TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef MasterTM_TimeBase;
00082   TM_OutputInitTypeDef MasterTM_OutInit;
00083 
00084   /* Enable peripheral's clock of AFIO and GPTM                                                             */
00085   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00086   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                    = 1;
00087   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_TM_MASTER_IPN     = 1;
00088   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA                    = 1;
00089   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00090 
00091   /* Configure AFIO mode as Master Timer function.                                                          */
00092   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MASTER_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_MASTER_AFIO_FUN);
00093 
00094   /* Master Timer Configuration                                                                             */
00095   MasterTM_TimeBase.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00096   MasterTM_TimeBase.Prescaler = SystemCoreClock/10000;       /* Timer clock = CK_AHB / Prescaler = 10 kHz   */
00097   MasterTM_TimeBase.CounterReload = HTCFG_MASTER_PERIOD - 1; /* Reload counter every 10 Hz (10 kHz / 1000 = 10 Hz) */
00098   MasterTM_TimeBase.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00099   MasterTM_TimeBase.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00100   TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, &MasterTM_TimeBase);
00101 
00102   /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                   */
00103   TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00104 
00105   /* Channel n capture configuration                                                                        */
00106   MasterTM_OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_MASTER_CH;
00107   MasterTM_OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE;        /* Toggle Mode                                   */
00108   MasterTM_OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00109   MasterTM_OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00110   MasterTM_OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_INVERTED;
00111   MasterTM_OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00112   MasterTM_OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00113   MasterTM_OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00114   MasterTM_OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00115   MasterTM_OutInit.Compare = HTCFG_MASTER_PERIOD;          /* Toggle IO once every 10 Hz (10 kHz / 1000 = 10 Hz)*/
00116   TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, &MasterTM_OutInit);
00117 
00118   /* Enable TM Channel Update Event interrupt                                                               */
00119   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00120 
00121   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_MASTER_IRQ);
00122 
00123   TM_MMSELConfig(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, TM_MMSEL_UPDATE);
00124   TM_TimSyncCmd(HTCFG_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00125 }
00126 
00127 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00128   * @brief  MCTM Configuration.This timer is used to trigger another timer.
00129   * @retval None
00130   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00131 void SlaveTimer_Configuration(void)
00132 {
00133   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00134      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00135      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00136   */
00137   TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef SlaveTM_TimeBase;
00138   TM_OutputInitTypeDef SlaveTM_OutInit;
00139 
00140   /* Enable peripheral's clock of AFIO and TM                                                               */
00141   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00142   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                   = 1;
00143   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_TM_SLAVE_IPN     = 1;
00144   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00145 
00146   /* Configure AFIO mode as MCTM function.                                                                  */
00147   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLAVE_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLAVE_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_SLAVE_AFIO_FUN);
00148 
00149   /* Time base configuration                                                                                */
00150   SlaveTM_TimeBase.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00151   SlaveTM_TimeBase.Prescaler = SystemCoreClock/100000;         /* Timer clock = CK_AHB / Prescaler = 100 kHz*/
00152   SlaveTM_TimeBase.CounterReload = HTCFG_SLAVE_PERIOD - 1;     /* Period = 100 kHz / 1000 = 100 Hz = 10 ms  */
00153   SlaveTM_TimeBase.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00154   SlaveTM_TimeBase.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00155   TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, &SlaveTM_TimeBase);
00156 
00157   /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                   */
00158   TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00159 
00160   /* Channel n capture configuration                                                                        */
00161   SlaveTM_OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_SLAVE_CH;
00162   SlaveTM_OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;            /* PWM2 Mode                                          */
00163   SlaveTM_OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00164   SlaveTM_OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00165   SlaveTM_OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00166   SlaveTM_OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00167   SlaveTM_OutInit.Compare = HTCFG_SLAVE_PERIOD/3;     /* Duty cycle = 10ms/3 = 3.3ms                        */
00168   SlaveTM_OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00169   SlaveTM_OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00170   SlaveTM_OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00171   TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, &SlaveTM_OutInit);
00172 
00173   /* Enable TM Channel Update Event interrupt                                                               */
00174   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00175   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_SLAVE_IRQ);
00176 
00177   /* Setting Internal Trigger                                                                               */
00178   TM_StiConfig(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, HTCFG_TM_SLAVE_TRSEL_ITI);
00179   TM_SlaveModeConfig(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, TM_SMSEL_TRIGGER);
00180 
00181   #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_TM_SLAVE_IPN))
00182   /* MCTM channel Main Output Enable                                                                        */
00183   MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_SLAVE_PORT, ENABLE);
00184   #endif
00185 }
00186 
00187 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00188 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00189   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00190   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00191   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00192   * @retval None
00193   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00194 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00195 {
00196   /*
00197      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00198      Debug message can be added here.
00199      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00200   */
00201 
00202   while (1)
00203   {
00204   }
00205 }
00206 #endif
